title: The Mini Book of Pies  - Happy B day Ruby
description:
The Mini Book of Pies by Sophie Conran

English | 2013 | ISBN: 0007498713 | 192 pages | EPUB | 15 MB


Pies are the ultimate comfort food. Enjoy sweet & savoury pies, try traditional & modern recipes & discover new family favourites with The Mini Book of Pies. The perfect book for the beginner pie maker, it features 85 inventive & delicious recipes for the true British classic, the pie. This book also includes simple to follow guides on making pastry, pie dishes & pie decoration & also reveals a few secret baking tips, making sure your pies turn out perfect every time (& no soggy bottoms!). Whether you are looking for simple family suppers or pies to impress; a winter warmer or a summer picnic pie; a meaty pie, a veggie pie, a fish pie or a classic pudding pie, you will find it in The Mini Books of Pies. Recipes include; Beef & Beer Pie with Sweet Potato Mash Pie Moroccan Lamb with Apricots Pie Sausage & Caramelised Onion with Mash Pie Spanish Chicken Pie Smoked Trout & Almond Quick Pie Roasted Vegetable with Cumin Puff Pastry Pie Butternut Squash, Sage & Goats Cheese Pie Easy Peasy Plum & Blackberry Pie Features content first published in Pies by Sophie Conran, 2006
